review: GOOD. ONLY ONE TIME WHILE WATCHING A MOVIE IT WENT OFF LINE.
author: Amber quiros

review: I'm really disappointed in the Amazon Prime video service in general, it's just so hard to see what "Prime Included" movies are available to me and I really had hoped that the Amazon Fire TV Stick would have made it easier on me. When I want to watch TV, I just want to browse movies that I might have never seen before or might want to watch again, and the interface in Fire TV Stick did nothing to help me with that.  The only thing the Fire TV Stick does is transfer the crappy interface from my computer to my TV.  That's still useful, but less useful than I had hoped.
author: Dawn Diaz
